question: Extended color mode is turned OFF by setting what bit of the VIC-II register?
What is the location of the VIC-II register that needs to be modified to turn off extended color mode?
What is the hexadecimal value that needs to be written to the VIC-II register to turn off extended color mode?
What is the condition to turn off extended color mode?
answer: setting bit 6 of the VIC-II register to a 0
